definition: to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Please fill in following fields then click the submit button , we will send your replying form to your E-mail box .
sentences.chinese: 系統會將您的報名回函寄發到您的電子郵件信箱。

sentences.english: A: Did they ask you to send the files beforehand?
sentences.chinese: 他們要你提前寄發文件了嗎？

sentences.english: The package sent to a search only after the staff packet.
sentences.chinese: 所寄發的包裹要工作人員查檢後才能封包。

sentences.english: The bank also sends collection instructions to the physician monitoring the pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 臍血站還會給助產醫師寄發託收指示。

sentences.english: Post contracts from Foreign Affairs Department and confirming contract terms with foreign teachers.
sentences.chinese: 外事處寄發合同給外籍教師，確定合同條款。

sentences.english: Send goodbye message to members when they are unsubscribed?
sentences.chinese: 當有新會員加入時，是否寄發歡迎信？

sentences.english: All the invitations have not been mailed.
sentences.chinese: 並非所有的請貼都已經寄發出去了。

sentences.english: We are glad to send you this introductory letter, hoping that it will be the prelude to mutually beneficial relations between us.
sentences.chinese: 我們欣然寄發這封自薦信，希望是互利關係的前奏。

sentences.english: Can I collect and send my reference letters directly to Trace Foundation?
sentences.chinese: 推薦信可以由我統一寄發給利衆基金會嗎？

sentences.english: An admission notice will be mailed to the accepted students individually.
sentences.chinese: 錄取名單除在網頁公告外，並以專函寄發錄取通知。

sentences.english: Are the email newsletters you subscribe to also available as RSS feeds or vice versa?
sentences.chinese: 以郵件寄發的時事資訊是否也RSS訂閱了？

definition: a tax return/a tax declaration form
to bear joint responsibility for sth/joint liability (law)

pinyin: gu3 dong1 te4 bie2 da4 hui4
